DOC.brief_summary: Background : Over 39 % approximately 3,000 doctor ( The British Medical Association quarterly survey , 2015 ) admit frequently feel drain , exhaust , overload , tire , low lack energy . Such occupational distress may link psychological physical difficulty doctor negative outcome organization patient . The aim current study investigate impact induction programme occupational distress doctor . Methods/design : Doctors invite take part online research . Participants randomly assign experimental control group . Participants experimental group complete one induction topic ( stress work ) . Before induction programme participant ask fill online survey current occupational distress organizational well-being . Discussion : The investigator expect doctor ' psychological , physiological organizational well-being improve induction programme serve resource well doctor 's health understanding .
DOC.brief_title: Occupational Distress Doctors : The Effect Induction Programme
DOC.criteria: Medical doctor across specialty professional grade regular contact patient work United Kingdom .
